definitions.definition: To make temporarily or permanently blind.
definitions.example: Don't wave that pencil in my face - do you want to blind me?

definitions.definition: To darken; to obscure to the eye or understanding; to conceal.
To cover with a thin coating of sand and fine gravel, for example a road newly paved, in order that the joints between the stones may be filled.
Lacking intellectual discernment, for example because of greed or stupidity.
(of a bus) Displaying a particular destination or route number on the blinds.
definitions.example: The bus was blinded for route 100 to the city centre.
